title: Angelina's Halloween
description: Trick-or-Treat with Angelina Ballerina!  For Halloween, Angelina and her friend Alice make glorious firefly costumes—complete with delicate wings and tiaras.  Angelina's little sister, Polly, wants to be a pretty firefly too.  But Angelina thinks she's too little.  Polly settles for dressing up as a ghost, and on Halloween night, gives Angelina a surprise scare!
author: Katharine Holabird
